name: Mazes
description:
Mazes is a game about solving, yes you guessed it, Mazes.
You move around the mazes as you try to work out the solution.
As you solve more mazes your hand eye co-ordination increases and also your ability to route as you navigate.
Mazes are generated randomly and have a wide difficulty set, so you might find some really tough while others just plain simple. Players with Average Maze Time less than 20 are great at multi-tasking.
